```{r}
load("synonyms.rda")
load("synonyms2a.rda")
load("synonyms2.rda")

d1$source <- "IUCN"
d2$source <- "GBIF"
d3$source <- "primate_maps"
d<-unique(rbind(d1,d2,d3))

dd<-unique(d[,c(7,3)])


```
